title: 'There's no place like home': Newborns dress up as 'Wizard of Oz' characters in honor of film's 80th anniversary
text:
These munchkins dressed as "Wizard of Oz" characters will send you over the rainbow.

Allegheny Health Network

Nurses at Pittsburgh’s West Penn Hospital dressed four newborns in honor of the film's 80th anniversary.

Allegheny Health Network

From Dorothy’s iconic checkered dress and ruby red slippers,

Allegheny Health Network

to a Tin Man with an extra big heart,

Allegheny Health Network

these little ones will make your troubles melt like lemon drops.

Allegheny Health Network

Allegheny Health Network

Allegheny Health Network

"The Wizard of Oz" was released 80 years ago this Sunday.
description: Four newborns dress up as 'The Wizard of Oz' characters at a Pittsburgh Hospital.
